drive-in: please remember to replace the speaker on the post when you leave the theatre. show starts in one minute

were happy to have you with us this evening and want you to enjoy every minute of your stay here. while you relax and stretch visit our concession where youll find something to please you. there are ice-cold drinks delicious sandwiches ice cream coffee and snacks and many other pleasing treats. our foods are fresh and tasty our drinks satisfying and refreshing. theyre so good. you get more out of life when you go out to a movie
